author: makortel
body:
This PR reverts the changes in the Phase1 conversion configuration files done in #7794. The aim was primarily to restore the format of the files to what they are in 62X_SLHC for e.g. easier git diffing, but it revealed also some unintended changes in the conversion configuration that are undone in this PR. For the record, the changes were (introduced in #7794, reverted here)
- Seeding layers
  - Pixel TTRH was changed from `TTRHBuilderWithoutAngle4PixelPairs` to `WithTrackAngle`
  - Strip cluster charge cut was enabled
- `convStepTracks` TTRH was changed from `WithTrackAngle` to `WithAngleAndTemplate`
- `photonConvTrajSeedFromSingleLeg`
  - Maximum numbers for clusters were changed
  - `RegionFactoryPSet.RegionPSet.ptMin` was changed from 0.3 to 0.2

@rovere @VinInn @boudoul @venturia
title: Revert Phase1 conversion configuration files
